name: yA_HUD
body:
---------------

More **Screenshots**[can be found here](http://imgur.com/a/xylsT).
Custom options [can be found here](http://imgur.com/a/0o11h) (Some screenshots might be a bit out-dated)

---------------

Please read the **Readme** files, they contain answers to various questions.

Instruction on how to **customize** this HUD can be found in the CUSTOMIZATION.txt.

I also wrote a FAQ including useful links & various console commands

---------------

To **download** the HUD press the **ZIP** button on the left.

---------------

To **install** navigate to Steam / steamapps / common / team fortress 2 / tf / custom / .
There you will want to create a folder with a random name (you can call it "hud" for example) and then copy the resource and the scripts folder (from the HUD version that you want to use) into that newly created folder.

------------

This [SteamGroup](http://steamcommunity.com/groups/yahud) will be used for updates and general communication.

---------------

![Blank Version](http://i.imgur.com/gJLZMA3.jpg)
**Blank Version** (Lower Version available also)


------------

![White Box](http://i.imgur.com/vp0pOc0.jpg)
**White Box** (Lower Version available also)

--------------

![Center Version](http://i.imgur.com/6x6Ndzn.jpg)
**Center Version**

--------------

![Box Version](http://i.imgur.com/HTB1osL.jpg)
**Box Version**

---------------

![Spectator HUD](http://i.imgur.com/jZNfoop.jpg)
**Spectator HUD**

Here with the 6v6 scoreboard. 16v16 scoreboard can be toggled via hud_minmode and other scoreboards are available.
[Click to see all the Scoreboards](http://imgur.com/a/x3vTd)

---------------

![Menu](http://i.imgur.com/4TCXrKh.jpg)
**Main Menu** with optional simple background

---------------

Various options are available, such as this combination here: http://i.imgur.com/xNpSB3r.jpg
Instructions are included.

---------------

If you have requests or bug reports please go to the [GitHub Page](https://github.com/whayay/yA_HUD) and then click on **Issues**.

----------------

A big "thank you" goes out to Garm3n and everyone else who helped me make this HUD.

[Fog's crosshairs](http://i.imgur.com/vJsoF2g.png) are part of the HUD now, information is in the readme
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
